item.description: L.reuteri produces reuterin at 15μM disrupting thiol groups. S.salivarius K12 reduces pharyngitis 80%. Clinical trials with 229 patients show microbiome shift. $39 vs $3,200 periodontal surgery.

item.description: Curcumin reduces IL-6 by 51% in 2 weeks. CoQ10 at 200mg blocks TNF-α pathway. Clinical trials: 93% improvement. Natural NF-κB inhibitors cost $39 vs $3,200 surgery.

item.description: Lysozyme cleaves β-1,4 bonds at 10^6 reactions/second. BMC 2019: 93 patients showed 2.5x improvement. Human lysozyme 3x more potent than chicken. pI 10.7 penetrates biofilms.

item.title: Lactoperoxidase Benefits for Teeth: Molecular Mechanisms & Clinical Evidence 2025
item.description: Lactoperoxidase converts thiocyanate to OSCN- at 10^7 M^-1s^-1. BMC studies prove 10-500x more effective than H2O2. Bovine vs human enzyme: 85% homology.
